doc.name: revBrowserPrint
doc.summary: Prints the current page of the specified browser.

description.p: The revBrowserPrint command prints the current page of the browser specified by the instanceId. On issuing this command, the standard operating system print dialog will appear, allowing the user to choose printer options and confirm that the page should be printed.
The instanceId is the integer identifier of a browser object
The revBrowserPrint command puts empty into the result
The revBrowserPrint command does not require the printing library to be included.
Note: For general information on using the browser library, see the notes in the revBrowserOpen function reference.
